title: NTO Pipeline Transcript
description: Schema for tutoring session transcripts used in the NTO Pipeline for annotation

transcript.description: Array of utterances in the conversation

_id.description: Unique identifier for this utterance within the session

content.description: The actual text content of the utterance

session_id.description: Session identifier (optional, may be added during processing)

annotations.description: Array of annotations for this utterance (PER_UTTERANCE annotation type)

_id.description: Reference to the utterance _id this annotation belongs to

items.description: Annotation object with dynamic fields based on annotation schema

leadRole.description: Primary instructor role in the session (e.g., 'Tutor', 'Teacher')

annotations.description: Array of session-level annotations (PER_SESSION annotation type)

items.description: Annotation object with dynamic fields based on annotation schema
